Author: grossenten98
Text: Dang, same there. Everyone kept joking about how they’ll gain weight from that one meal. I decided to eat some turkey after my grandpa (who knows about my ED) brought me a cold diet sprite that I didn’t even ask for. That made me so happy :D It’s awful being surrounded by people who just talk about weight while eating, It makes me feel so normal lol. But man, my grandpa is the best ever!
